law.text: The director shall from time to time test all weights and measures used in checking the receipt or disbursement of supplies in every institution for the maintenance of which moneys are appropriated by the legislature, reporting his findings, in writing, to the supervisory board and the executive officer of the institution concerned.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 304, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 10.
